com.esri.mo2.file.shp
Class ShapefileMemoryIndex

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.file.shp.ShapefileMemoryIndex
All Implemented Interfaces:
ShapefileIndex
public class ShapefileMemoryIndex
extends Object
implements ShapefileIndex

This class acts as a wrapper around an in-memory spatial index. This class will use a manual spatial index until the in-memory index is completely assembled. When the in-memory index is formed, the manual index will no longer be used.

Constructor Summary
ShapefileMemoryIndex(ShpFile shp, boolean useClone)
          creates a spatial index instance and associates it with the specified shapefile.

          closes the spatial index.

          searches the index for all features crossing and within the envelope.

Method Detail

exists

public boolean exists()
Description copied from interface: ShapefileIndex
determines if the spatial index exists. This method is primarily used by file-based indexes. Memory based indexes should simply return true.

Specified by:
exists in interface ShapefileIndex
Returns:
true if the index exists, false otherwise

open

public void open()
Description copied from interface: ShapefileIndex
opens the spatial index. This method is primarily designed for file based classes. Memory based indexes should simply return.

Specified by:

public void close()
Description copied from interface: ShapefileIndex
closes the spatial index. This method is primarily designed for file based classes. Memory based indexes should simply return.

Specified by:
close in interface ShapefileIndex

isAvailable

public boolean isAvailable()
Description copied from interface: ShapefileIndex
determines if the spatial index is available for use. This method is primarily designed for classes that build their index "on the fly". In these cases, the index is not available while it is being constructed.

Specified by:
isAvailable in interface ShapefileIndex
Returns:
true if the index is available, false otherwise

search

public BitArray search(Envelope env)
Description copied from interface: ShapefileIndex
searches the index for all features crossing and within the envelope.

Specified by:

Parameters:

Returns:
BitArray containing the results
